answerText: the liver[10] Jaundice can be a symptom of this scarring of the liver, often caused by alcohol abuse.

subject: Science
question: Question: Jaundice is a common symptom of diseases of this organ. [10] Name this largest internal organ, which is inflamed in hepatitis.
